content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: SEUPDES
      operator: non_empty
    - name: ETCD
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: UNPLAN
Core:
  Id: CORE-000095
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when SEUPDES ^= null, ETCD ^= 'UNPLAN'
Outcome:
  Message: ETCD is not 'UNPLAN', when SEUPDES is not empty
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0211
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: If the sponsor decides that the subject's experience
                  for a particular period of time cannot be represented with one of
                  the planned Elements, then that period of time should be represented
                  as an unplanned Element. The value of ETCD for an unplanned Element
                  is "UNPLAN" and SEUPDES should be populated with a description of
                  the unplanned Element.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Assumption 4
                Section: '5.3'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - SE

json.Description: Raise an error when SEUPDES ^= null, ETCD ^= 'UNPLAN'

Outcome.Message: ETCD is not 'UNPLAN', when SEUPDES is not empty

Citations.Cited_Guidance: If the sponsor decides that the subject's experience for a particular period of time cannot be represented with one of the planned Elements, then that period of time should be represented as an unplanned Element. The value of ETCD for an unplanned Element is "UNPLAN" and SEUPDES should be populated with a description of the unplanned Element.
